column1: Smoque BBQ////The BBQ sauce: I really enjoyed the Memphis style sauce
column2: though it may have been just a tad spicier than I like my BBQ sauce to be (I much prefer a sweet sauce
column3: and Memphis is typically on the sweeter side
column4: so I was surprised that it wasn't as sweet). However
column5: I wasn't a fan of the Carolina BBQ sauce at all. I like that they were clearly labeled
column6: and even gave some direction for which sauce to put on which meats. They recommended putting the Carolina on the brisket
column7: but I'm glad I just dipped a tiny bit to try it first
column8: because my food would've been ruined had I put all the Carolina sauce on my brisket. Waaaaay too much vinegar for me (I know
column9: that's how Carolina sauce is supposed to be...but still
